label: neurologic, endocrine, and pancreatic disease, multisystem, infantile-onset 2
congenital disorder of glycosylation,  type IIw
deafness, autosomal recessive 118, with cochlear aplasia
heterotaxy, visceral, 10, autosomal, with male infertility
heterotaxy, visceral, 11, autosomal, with male infertility
cholestasis, progressive familial intrahepatic, 7, with or without hearing loss
leukodystrophy, hypomyelinating, 23, with ataxia, deafness, liver dysfunction, and dilated cardiomyopathy
hypogonadotropic hypogonadism 26 with or without anosmia
epidermolysis bullosa simplex 2d, generalized, intermediate or severe, autosomal recessive
Batten-Turner congenital myopathy
definition: A congenital myopathy described by Batten (1910) and later Turner (1949) and Turner and Lees (1962) in which a family of 6 siblings presented in infancy the picture of 'amyotonia congenita' and later in life a nonprogressive myopathy.

label: reactive airway disease
definition: Coughing, wheezing, or shortness of breath that is triggered by allergens, infection, or other irritants.

label: vitamin D deficiency
definition: Abnormally low level of 25-hydroxyvitamin D in the blood.

label: mild ichthyosis vulgaris
definition: An instance of ichthyosis vulgaris in which the disease presentation is mild in severity. Heterozygote FLG mutation carriers often have mild manifestations.

label: severe ichthyosis vulgaris
definition: An instance of ichthyosis vulgaris in which the disease presentation is severe in severity. Homozygous FLG mutation carriers often have more severe manifestations.

label: lipodystrophy, partial, acquired, susceptibility to
definition: An inherited susceptibility or predisposition to developing aquired partial lipodystrophy.

label: rifampicin-resistant tuberculosis
definition: A form of drug-resistant tuberculosis that is resisant to rifampicin with or without resistance to other antitubercular medications.

label: autoimmune primary adrenal insufficiency
definition: Diminished production of adrenocortical hormones due to autoimmune destruction of the adrenal glands.

label: active tuberculosis
definition: Tuberculosis caused by primary infection of or reactivation of latent Mycobacterium tuberculosis. Active tuberculosis characterized by clinical manifestation and active symptoms compatible with tuberculosis, and is distinct from latent tuberculosis infection that occurs without signs or symptoms of active disease.

label: extensively drug-resistant tuberculosis
definition: A type of drug-resistant tuberculosis that is resistant to any fluoroquinolone, and at least one of three second-line injectable drugs (capreomycin, kanamycin, and amikacin), in addition to resistance to rifampicin and isoniazid.

label: totally drug-resistant tuberculosis
definition: A type of drug-resistant tuberculosis that is resistant to all first- and second-line antitubercular drugs tested (isoniazid, rifampicin, streptomycin, ethambutol, pyrazinamide, ethionamide, para-aminosalicylic acid, cycloserine, ofloxacin, amikacin, ciprofloxacin, capreomycin, kanamycin).

label: TSPAN12-related vitreoretinopathy
definition: A vitreoretinopathy caused by variants in the TSPAN12 gene.

label: KCNH1 associated disorder
definition: Any neurodevelopmental disorder in which the cause of the disease is a mutation in the KCNH1 gene. Variants in KCNH1 cause significant neurodevelopmental disabilities that lie along a phenotypic spectrum ranging from non-syndromic to syndromic. The most common phenotypes associated with variants in KCNH1 include intellectual disability, seizures, hypotonia, absence or hypoplasia of nails, and gingival enlargement. Hypoplastic terminal phalanges of fingers and toes, proximal placement and long thumb, and long toes present less frequently.

label: adult acne
definition: Acne that occurs in an adult.

label: chromosome 1 disorder
definition: Chromosomal disorder in which chromosome 1 is affected.

label: chromosome 2 disorder
definition: Chromosomal disorder in which chromosome 2 is affected.

label: chromosome 3 disorder
definition: Chromosomal disorder in which chromosome 3 is affected.

label: chromosome 4 disorder
definition: Chromosomal disorder in which chromosome 4 is affected.

label: chromosome 5 disorder
definition: Chromosomal disorder in which chromosome 5 is affected.

label: chromosome 6 disorder
definition: Chromosomal disorder in which chromosome 6 is affected.

label: chromosome 7 disorder
definition: Chromosomal disorder in which chromosome 7 is affected.

label: chromosome 8 disorder
definition: Chromosomal disorder in which chromosome 8 is affected.

label: chromosome 9 disorder
definition: Chromosomal disorder in which chromosome 9 is affected.

label: chromosome 10 disorder
definition: Chromosomal disorder in which chromosome 10 is affected.

label: chromosome 11 disorder
definition: Chromosomal disorder in which chromosome 11 is affected.

label: chromosome 12 disorder
definition: Chromosomal disorder in which chromosome 12 is affected.

label: chromosome 13 disorder
definition: Chromosomal disorder in which chromosome 13 is affected.

label: chromosome 14 disorder
definition: Chromosomal disorder in which chromosome 14 is affected.

label: chromosome 15 disorder
definition: Chromosomal disorder in which chromosome 15 is affected.

label: chromosome 16 disorder
definition: Chromosomal disorder in which chromosome 16 is affected.

label: chromosome 19 disorder
definition: Chromosomal disorder in which chromosome 19 is affected.

label: chromosome 20 disorder
definition: Chromosomal disorder in which chromosome 20 is affected.

label: chromosome 22 disorder
definition: Chromosomal disorder in which chromosome 22 is affected.

label: chromosome X disorder
definition: Chromosomal disorder in which chromosome X is affected.

label: chromosome Y disorder
definition: Chromosomal disorder in which chromosome Y is affected.

label: complete trisomy 21
definition: Trisomy 21 characterized by the presence of an extra chromosome 21 in all the cells of the organism.

label: mosaic trisomy 18
definition: Trisomy 18 in which the presence of an extra copy of chromosome 18 is present only in some of the cells of the organism.

label: complete trisomy 18
definition: Trisomy 18 in which the presence of an extra copy of chromosome 18 is present in all the cells of the organism.

label: complete trisomy 13
definition: Trisomy 13 in which the presence of an extra copy of chromosome 13 is present in all the cells of the organism.

label: mosaic trisomy 13
definition: Trisomy 13 in which the presence of an extra copy of chromosome 13 is present only in some of the cells of the organism.

label: monosomy chromosome 8
definition: A chromosomal disorder consisting of the absence of one chromosome 8.

label: fibrothecoma
definition: A sex cord-stromal tumor characterized by mixed features of both fibroma and thecoma.

label: testicular fibrothecoma
definition: A rare testicular sex cord-stromal neoplasm characterized by mixed features of both fibroma and thecoma.

label: TDP-43 proteinopathy
definition: Disease characterized by the presence of abnormally phosphorylated, ubiquitinated, and cleaved DNA-binding protein TDP-43 in affected brain and spinal cord. Inclusions of the pathologic protein in neurons and glia, without the presence of AMYLOID, is the major feature of these conditions, thus making these proteinopathies distinct from most other neurogenerative disorders in which protein misfolding leads to brain amyloidosis. Both frontotemporal lobar degeneration and AMYOTROPHIC LATERAL SCLEROSIS exhibit this common method of pathogenesis and thus they may represent two extremes of a continuous clinicopathological spectrum of one disease.

label: bladder exstrophy-epispadias-cloacal extrophy complex
definition: An anterior midline defect with variable expression involving the infraumbilical abdominal wall including the pelvis, urinary tract, and external genitalia.

label: neonatal jaundice due to ABO incompatibility
definition: Jaundice that appears during the neonatal period due to high levels of unconjugated bilirubin that are a result of maternal-fetal ABO incompatibility.

label: proximal chromosome 18q deletion syndrome
definition: Chromosome abnormality that occurs when there is a missing (deleted) copy of genetic material from the part of the long (q) arm near the center of chromosome 18.

label: distal chromosome 18q deletion syndrome
definition: Distal chromosome 18q deletion syndrome is a chromosome abnormality that occurs when there is a missing (deleted) copy of genetic material at the end of the long arm (q) of chromosome 18.

label: BAFopathy
definition: Disorder caused by mutations in the various subunits composing the BAF complex.

label: ACTL6A-related BAFopathy
definition: Any BAFopathy in which the cause of the disease is a mutation in the ACTL6A gene.

label: PBRM1-related BAFopathy
definition: Any BAFopathy in which the cause of the disease is a mutation in the PBRM1 gene.

label: SMARCC1-related BAFopathy
definition: Any BAFopathy in which the cause of the disease is a mutation in the SMARCC1 gene.

label: chromosome 21 disorder
definition: Chromosomal disorder in which chromosome 21 is affected.

label: chromosome 18 disorder
definition: Chromosomal disorder in which chromosome 18 is affected.

label: trisomy 21
definition: A chromosomal disorder consisting of the presence of an extra chromosome 21.

label: mosaic trisomy 21
definition: Trisomy 21 characterized by the presence of an extra chromosome 21 in some of the cells of the organism.

label: translocation Down syndrome
definition: Down syndrome in which the extra (partial or total) copy of chromosome 21 is attached to another chromosome.

label: mosaic translocation Down syndrome
definition: Translocation Down syndrome in which the extra (partial or total) copy of chromosome 21 attached to another chromosome is present in some of the cells of the organism.

label: partial Trisomy 21
definition: A chromosomal disorder consisting of the partial duplication of chromosome 21.
